Title: Oppose aggression protect the great force of peace
Designer: Ren Shuaiying (任率英)Ren Mengzhang (任梦璋)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The poster is dominated by a copy of the Joint Statement by Mao Zedong and Nikita Khrushchev. It was published on 3 Augustus 1958 in Beijing, after four days of negotiations. Behind it are anti-imperialist fighters from around the world, the cowering caricatures in front represent the US and the UK.This poster is from the second edition; the first edition was published in the same month.
Theme: Sino-Soviet CooperationForeign Friends: National Liberation Movements
